snippet: It would be Twitter’s biggest mass purge of accounts affiliated with the Islamic State and its supporters.
abstract: Twitter representative confirms that 10,000 accounts linked to Islamic State have been suspended.
lead_paragraph: It would be Twitter’s biggest mass purge of accounts affiliated with the Islamic State and its supporters.

headline.main: Twitter Says It Suspended 10,000 ISIS-Linked Accounts in One Day
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; More Pro-ISIS Accounts Are Suspended, Twitter Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
